title: Finding matches
body:
Does anyone else spend more time finding matches then actually playing?
-Que 
-Lobby, someone dodges
-Que 
-Lobby, someone dodges
-Que
-Lobby, get into game
-Early surrender someone AFK
--Que 
-Gets support, yeah na didn't wait this long to play support, dodges

replies.body: This happened to me as well, but if you get support and there's no dodge, and if there is a early surrender, then you will be guaranteed one of your selected positions when you enter queue the next time.

well atleast you can find  a game since the update for 8:11 i cant even get into games it sits in lobby with the "players are not ready" on the play button and the timer doesnt even start this is in normals ranks even fucking bots
